channel.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
channel.description:
Whenever I play Black Mesa it shows up as Source SDK 2007 in my friends list. It's kind of distracting and I was wondering if there's any way to make it say Black Mesa again.
I've tried reinstalling both the SDK and BMS without any luck.

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
Yeah I honestly don’t know. It’s been like that ever since one of the Steam updates.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
I mean exactly what I said. It shows up as Black Mesa when I run it through Steam. Perhaps it’s just different for you for some inexplicable reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Mine shows up as Black Mesa when I run it through Steam, and SDK Base 2007 when I run it from Hammer.

What do you mean? I only get it showing up as SDK Base 2007 when I run it as a mod.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.description:
Yeah, I assumed it was a problem with Steam since it happened after one of the latest updates.

Looking forward to the Steam version.

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
As far as I know, all mods are displayed like that right now. The steam version will display the name properly.

item.description:
Black Mesa says In-Mod tho.

item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Black Mesa counts as a non-steam game. It wont make a difference either way.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Alyxx
item.description:
That’s a neat little solution but… not quite what I was looking for.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing

item.title: Black Mesa shows up as Source SDK 2007 when playing
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Add a non-steam game like a browser or just about any program, right click on it in the library and click properties and then rename it to “Black Mesa”. Launch it first and then Black Mesa, and there you go.

Read full topic
